t: The Quilted Bear
s: The Quilted Bear has been in operation for over 20 years, initially selling from a retail store in Bristol. Now exhibiting at many specialist craft and quilting related shows throughout the UK, we also sell a huge selection of products online. We really believe in giving our customers what they want, which is why we offer such an extensive selection of products for you to choose from. We’ve scoured the haberdashery universe to find the best brands ...
